news.title: KNEECAP's Móglaí Bap makes surprise appearance at Féile an Phobail
news.summary: "Big respect to the people of West Belfast who are always on the right side of history," Ó Cairealláin told the crowd.

news.title: Pa Sheehy announces Belfast, Limerick and Killarney acoustic shows
news.summary: Tickets go on sale this Friday, August 15.

news.title: Electric Picnic adds new piano stage
news.summary: "It’s not just an instrument; it’s an invitation. The piano is about connection, between artist and audience, between music and the magical Stradbally Estate," says the festival organisers.

news.title: Al Jazeera responds after journalists killed by Israeli strike: "Another blatant and premeditated attack on press freedom"
news.summary: "Anas [Al Sharif] and his colleagues were among the last remaining voices from within Gaza, providing the world with unfiltered, on-the-ground coverage of the devastating realities endured by its people," Al Jazeera wrote.

news.title: Online pre-orders for our Electric Picnic Special Issue with cover star Hozier to close on Wednesday morning
news.summary: To avoid disappointment – and guarantee that a copy of the highly sought-after new issue arrives at your doorstep – pre-order your copy below...

news.title: Greta Thunberg joins Sam Fender onstage for "Free Palestine" call
news.summary: See footage of the moment below.

news.title: The White Horse Guitar Club announce new album Sos Beag and Irish tour
news.summary: The new record comes out on October 3, 2025.

news.title: Bob Dylan returns to the recording studio
news.summary: Bob Dylan is set to return to Dublin's 3Arena on November 25

news.title: Bohemian F.C. and Fontaines D.C. jersey collaboration raises €199,000 for Palestine
news.summary: Fontaines D.C. have worn the jersey while performing, and it has grown increasingly popular among fans.

news.title: CMAT stars in new BBC Radio 6 Music Artist in Residence – AAA episode
news.summary: In the episode, CMAT discusses the writing and production process behind her upcoming album EURO-COUNTRY.
